obfuscation: ﻿ Just a few years ago I felt quite confident in my knowledge in English .
original: ﻿	Just a few years ago I felt quite confident in my knowledge in English.

obfuscation: I had read English in school since I was ten years old and I had travelled quite a lot .
original: I had read English in school since I was ten years old and I had travelled quite a lot.

obfuscation: I thought that I mastered the language pretty well .
original: I thought that I mastered the language pretty well.

obfuscation: But what has happened since then ?
original: But what has happened since then?

obfuscation: How get my skills in the English language developed during the last three years ?
original: How have my skills in the English language developed during the last three years?

obfuscation: Starting with my skills in speaking , I must say that I have hardly spoken English since I left school .
original: Starting with my skills in speaking, I must say that I have hardly spoken English since I left school.

obfuscation: This is something that makes me feel nervous and insecure every time I try to speak English .
original: This is something that makes me feel nervous and insecure every time I try to speak English.

obfuscation: I always want the lyrics to come out right and to be able to speak fluently - and probably just because I want to so hard to speak properly , I tend to stumble instead .
original: I always want the words to come out right and to be able to speak fluently - and probably just because I want to so hard to speak properly, I tend to stumble instead.

obfuscation: I much ca n't find the right words and I have a hard time trying to figure out how to put things .
original: I often can't find the right words and I have a hard time trying to figure out how to put things.

obfuscation: I rarely know whether what I say is grammatically correct or not .
original: I seldom know whether what I say is grammatically correct or not.

obfuscation: I like making speeches , though , and using the language - both Swedish and English - to carry myself .
original: I like making speeches, though, and using the language - both Swedish and English - to express myself.

obfuscation: Despite this fact , I get nervous .
original: Despite this fact, I get nervous.

obfuscation: I think it 's because I 'm a bit shy , afraid to show early people what I can and ca n't do .
original: I think it's because I'm a bit shy, afraid to show other people what I can and can't do.

obfuscation: I have overcome this fear pretty a lot when it comes to speaking in Swedish , so probably it 's just a question of getting used to the English language .
original: I have overcome this fear pretty much when it comes to speaking in Swedish, so probably it's just a question of getting used to the English language.

obfuscation: Another thing is my accent .
original: Another thing is my accent.

obfuscation: When I was in the eight grade I was in London for a weekend .
original: When I was in the eight grade I was in London for a weekend.

obfuscation: At that time people said to me that it sounded like if I was born in England , - no wonder - , I had determined British English `` all my life '' .
original: At that time people said to me that it sounded like if I was born in England, - no wonder -, I had learnt British English "all my life".

obfuscation: Since then , though , I have spoken English to Germans , Americans and people of respective other nationalities during competitions and trainingcamps abroad .
original: Since then, though, I have spoken English to Germans, Americans and people of several other nationalities during competitions and trainingcamps abroad.

obfuscation: On the television I have largely heard American English .
original: On the television I have mostly heard American English.

obfuscation: I guess I 'm quite confused - do I speak American English or British English , ( I hardly know the differences , ) or is it something totally unlike ?
original: I guess I'm quite confused - do I speak American English or British English, (I hardly know the differences,) or is it something totally different?

obfuscation: Also when it comes to writing I feel that I have forgotten about how it 's made .
original: Also when it comes to writing I feel that I have forgotten about how it's done.

obfuscation: I have the like problems with finding words and with seeing the linguistic correctness as when I 'm speaking .
original: I have the same problems with finding words and with seeing the linguistic correctness as when I'm speaking.

obfuscation: Of course I do n't feel nervous in the like way , because I know that I can always stop to think and to look up words .
original: Of course I don't feel nervous in the same way, because I know that I can always stop to think and to look up words.

obfuscation: I 'm sure that one can easily understand in my writing that I 'm from Sweden .
original: I'm sure that one can easily see in my writing that I'm from Sweden.

obfuscation: I have a tendency towards thinking in Swedish and then trying to translate my thoughts directly into English .
original: I have a tendency towards thinking in Swedish and then trying to translate my thoughts directly into English.

obfuscation: That does n't always turn out too well ... To my advantages , though , I can say that I 'm a fast learner , and that I usually do n't think that spelling is a very large problem .
original:
That doesn't always turn out too well... 
To my advantages, though, I can say that I'm a fast learner, and that I usually don't think that spelling is a very big problem.

obfuscation: Listening to and reading English are two skills that I have used a fiddling bit , also during recent years .
original: Listening to and reading English are two skills that I have used a little bit, also during recent years.

obfuscation: I have n't travelled a lot lately , but I often hear spoken English on the television .
original: I haven't travelled much lately, but I often hear spoken English on the television.

obfuscation: I remember that both my listening and my reading abilities are rather satisfactory .
original: I think that both my listening and my reading abilities are rather satisfactory.

obfuscation: ( That is , of course , when the language is n't besides advanced . )
original: (That is, of course, when the language isn't too advanced.)

obfuscation: Even if I do n't understand all of the words , I can usually understand the context , and understand most of what is said or written .
original: Even if I don't understand all of the words, I can usually see the context, and understand most of what is said or written.

obfuscation: In eminent school I studied the A and B-course in English as compressed courses , which means that we only studied English for the three first terms in high school .
original: In high school I studied the A and B-course in English as compressed courses, which means that we only studied English for the three first terms in high school.

obfuscation: I actually think that one learns the language better if it 's taken continuously during the whole three years of education .
original: I really think that one learns the language better if it's taken continuously during the whole three years of education.

obfuscation: You need some time to digest the information and to practice the language for a retentive period of time .
original: You need some time to digest the information and to practice the language for a longer period of time.

obfuscation: The way we made it I felt that when I graduated I had almost forgotten ever reading English .
original: The way we did it I felt that when I graduated I had almost forgotten ever reading English.

obfuscation: I think that this is one thing that have affected my knowledge in English ( words for an example ) a bit negatively , compared with how it would be if I had read it for all three days .
original: I think that this is one thing that have affected my knowledge in English (words for an example) a bit negatively, compared with how it would be if I had read it for all three years.

obfuscation: To sum up I can say that what I need is to learn more words and grammar , to read and speak a lot , to become more secure , - in short terms ; to practice .
original: To sum up I can say that what I need is to learn more words and grammar, to read and speak a lot, to get more secure, - in short terms; to practice.

obfuscation: And I guess that practice is what I 'm going to get this term , while reading English A1 at Uppsala University .
original: And I guess that practice is what I'm going to get this term, while reading English A1 at Uppsala University.
